defs.name: read_directory_files
defs.docs:
function that read and save in a Vec<String> the content of a directory passed as input
 example: foo
             - fooFile.txt
             - fooFile2.txt
 the function will return: result = ["fooFile.txt", "fooFile2.txt"]
 it seems that the function is not handling the error properly.
 Even if an error is caught properly, it is not displayed so the user is not aware of it
 (october 3, 2020)
